Package common.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccountExistsException
    Throw this exception when an account with same mail or email is already registered.
    AlertDriver
    Throw this exception if PostgreSQL driver cannot be loaded.
    AlreadyExistTuple
    Throw this exception if a copy of a tuple is already registered.
    DifferentWishListException
    This exception is thrown when you try to modify a list different of the current list.
    ErrorConnectionException
    This exception is thrown when connection to the database is impossible.
    ErrorPasswordException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an invalid password.
    IncorrectLoginException
    This exception is thrown when the user try to connect him with a password with an incorrect password.
    InvalidPriceException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an invalid quantity.
    InvalidQuantityException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an invalid quantity.
    InvalidTypeAccount  
    JDBCQueryException
    Throw this exception if the syntax of the query is incorrect.
    LoadFromIntKeyException
    This error is thrown when no element from a LoadFromStringKey(name, value) are returned
    LoadFromStringKeyException
    Throw the exception if a parameter is unknow in a load request.
    NeedHaveBothIDUserAndLabelException
    This exception is thrown when we check if a wish list exists the IDUser or the label but one ore more is unset.
    NoCartException  
    NotExistingTuple
    This exception is throw when no tuple was found for the given class name.
    NotUniqueAttribute  
    NoWishListException
    This exception is throw when no wish list was set.
    PasswordErrorException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an invalid password.
    SessionErrorException
    This exception is thrown when the user is already connected.
    UnknowIDException
    This exception is thrown when BD doesn't find the ID.
    UnknownIDProductException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an unknown ID.
    UnknownIDSellerException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an unknown ID.
    UnknownLoginException
    This exception is thrown when the user enter an unkwnown login.
    WishListAlreadyExistException
    This exception is thrown when connection to the database is impossible.
